short_description: gaurav pawan & co. is an accounting & bookkeeping services company based in hisār, india.

long_description: it was established in the year 2012 with the core objective of providing professional expertise to its esteemed clients. the firm has come a long way in imparting knowledge and assistance to its clients. the firm effectively uses its vast experience and competence for the benefit of its clients. the firm is highly efficient to provide tax consultancy on both direct and indirect taxes. effective tax management, tax structuring and advisory services. gaurav gupta, qualified as a chartered accountant in 2011 and have around 10 years of experience serving variety of services in various categories (handling audits, attending taxations for individuals partnership firms and companies, representing clients' gst cases, income tax cases, organizing working capital, term loans and invetment advisory service for clients & handling gst act and other related matters). he is a specialist in the construction industry and provides industry specific consulting including project management processes and controls.
